mode.label: Select Question Type
mode.generalDescription: Practice with commonly asked interview questions

background.label: Background
background.placeholder: Enter your work experience and background

position.label: Target Position
position.placeholder: Enter the job position or industry you're applying for

confirm.title: End Interview?
confirm.message: To check the results of past interviews, please press "End Interview".

complete.title: Interview Complete
complete.message: Your interview session is complete. Would you like to view your feedback?

feedback.title: Results
feedback.subtitle: Review your interview performance and personalized feedback.
feedback.pricingNotice: Below is an overview of the plans and their current features. Please note that the features and pricing of each plan are subject to change.
feedback.evaluatingDescription: AI is analyzing your interview. This will only take a moment.
feedback.evaluatingDetailedDescription: AI is analyzing your responses to provide personalized feedback.

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Accuracy in selecting and using industry-specific terms and contextually appropriate vocabulary

grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.description: Accuracy in tenses, subject-verb agreement, and use of prepositions and articles

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: Logical organization of responses based on STAR/CAR framework

logic.title: Quantitative Evidence
logic.description: Presentation of achievements with specific numbers and percentages

feedback.question: Question {{number}}
feedback.extendedInterviewNotice: Premium plans allow interviews over 3 minutes

hero.title: Master English Interviews with AI
hero.subtitle: An AI-powered English interview practice platform. Practice anytime, as often as you need, to improve your English and interview skills.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive AI evaluation and feedback for effective interview preparation

anytime.title: Anytime, Any Frequency
anytime.description: Practice 24/7, 365 days a year at your convenience. No limits on practice sessions.

evaluation.title: English Ã— Interview Skills
evaluation.description: AI comprehensively evaluates pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, as well as response logic and persuasiveness.

personalized.title: Personalized Experience
personalized.description: Questions tailored to your experience and target industry. Analysis of past practice data to suggest effective learning approaches.

learning.title: How to Learn
learning.subtitle: A simple 3-step process for effective interview preparation

step1.title: Start Interview Practice
step1.description: One-on-one practice with AI in a simulated interview environment. Voice recognition enables natural conversation.

step2.title: Detailed Feedback
step2.description: Comprehensive evaluation of both English and interview skills. Specific improvement points and model answers provided.

step3.title: Continuous Improvement
step3.description: Identify weaknesses and engage in targeted practice to steadily improve your skills.
